text: @DWUhlfelderLaw @marcorubio My neighbor while walking my dog did a total @FoxNews commercial in three minutes. #COVID19 is spreading due to protesting, the Wendy's restaurant burning and looting is out of control and the shooting was justified. Guess I shouldn't say Hi anymore.  #FakeFox
